mapper.update: update agent_profit_settings set agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, percent = #{percent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor_number = #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agent_id, pay_channel_id, trade_type, percent, floor_number, created_at, updated_at from agent_profit_settings where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
